title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText component produces a beeping sound when I choose SWT.MULTI as the input type. This behavior seems unintended.
OB: When I choose SWT.MULTI as the input type for the ControlExampleText component, it produces a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the beeping sound.
